title: 97x2: Disqualification during Subordinate's Job Search
summary:
OGE comments on whether 5 C.F.R. § 2635.502 should preclude a Board member at an agency from participating in a meeting, about a rulemaking, if the Board member's subordinate is discussing employment with a trade association for the industry affected by that rulemaking.  

Notes: [Notes: (1) The guidance in this letter was modified by DAEOgram DO-06-002. (2) Changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024 have modified certain elements of the discussion in this letter relating to the 2635.502 “catch-all” and 2635.502(b)(1)(iii) “covered relationship” provisions.]
